title: Application Designer and Developer
description: In this program, I learned the basics to build an app and manage a team.
During the year, we had to complete a project in a group of three.
We chose the Scrum framework and rotated the Scrum Master each week.
We mainly learned how to plan a project by writing technical specifications, producing mockups, and creating schedules.

title: IT Developer
description: I learned the basics of several languages such as .NET, Go, and C++, along with some PHP using Laravel.
We completed a couple of projects, such as:
Creating and hosting a WordPress server on Debian using VMware
Building a weather station with an Arduino and a dashboard using Laravel to read the data
Creating a mobile app using Flutter and connecting it to a web API using Socket.IO and REST
Create a website for a dummy company including a shopping cart system
Creating a tracking app using JavaScript to track a robot's position
